topic: Cognitive biases affecting renewable energy adoption
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprising discoveries often lie within areas where my assumptions and biases are strongest. As a next step, I will actively seek feedback from diverse perspectives to identify these blind spots. Additionally, I'll explore literature on cognitive bias and decision-making to better understand how unexpected findings can be integrated into my thought processes constructively.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
